data.name: See You Next Happy Number
data.description:
This kata is the advanced version of [See You Next Happy Year](https://www.codewars.com/kata/see-you-next-happy-year) by MrZizoScream.

But here the sequential selection of digits does not work!

A **happy number** is a number with only **distinct digits**: e.g. 1023456789, 1023456798, ..., 5463782901, ..., 8143729560, ...,9876543201, 9876543210

## Task

Given a number, find the next happy number.

**Notes:**
* the number is always positive
* it is guaranteed that the answer exists


Input is within range 1000000000 toâ€‰ 9876543209 (both values included).


## Examples

```
1000000000 ==> return (1023456789)
1023456789 ==> return (1023456798)
9876543200 ==> return (9876543201)
```

ALL translations are welcome!

Enjoy Learning!!
